segments.text: Can you tell me a little bit about yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am a graduate of a technical university and have been employed as a technician with Company or approximately 10 years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please explain why you are interested in leaving your current position and please elaborate on your technical skills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am looking for a growth opportunity , which I feel is not available at my current employer . In terms of skills , I am Microsoft certified in Windows XP and several other operating system
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where do you see yourself five years from now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see myself in a management position .
segments.speaker: S2
